item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Changing an NPCs name is Client-Side. Which means, you can only do it by coding your client. And for making Objects talk (The objects donâ€™t really talk, just copy a code that actually shows an NPC talking in place of the Object.)
